name: PMF-ML
tagline: Predictive Modelling in Food Markup Language
body:
# What is PMF-ML?
PMF-ML is an standard defined by the Bundesinstitut f√ºr Risikobewertung (BfR) for enconding predictive microbial and Quantitative Microbial Risk Assessment (QMRA) models. PMF-ML is a plugin of SBML level 3 that extends SBML to support these models.

# Dependencies
This project provides a Java implementation of PMF-ML written on top of JSBML and Combine Archive Toolkit.

## JSBML
Open-source and pure Java library for handling SBML files. Developed by [Andreas Drager](http://sbrg.ucsd.edu/researchers/draeger/) and [Nicolas Rodriguez](http://lenoverelab.org/members/Nicolas_Rodriguez/). More information at [http://sbml.org/Software/JSBML](http://sbml.org/Software/JSBML)

## Combine Archive Toolkit
Java library to create, read, write and manipulate COMBINE archives. Developed by [Martin Scharm](https://www.sbi.uni-rostock.de/team/single/martin-scharm/). More info at [https://sems.uni-rostock.de/projects/combinearchive](https://sems.uni-rostock.de/projects/combinearchive).
